text: thumb|World map of countries based on median years in school. {| border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="width:100%; background:none;" |- |valign="top"| |valign="top"| |valign="top"| |}|455x430px This is a list of 189 countries ordered by the median number of years that the people in them go to school. The source data comes from the Human Development Index from the United Nations Development Programme's Human Development Report. The latest report was released on 14 September 2018 and is based on data collected in 2017. ==References== Category:Education lists by country Schooling, Median years of
title: List of countries by median years of schooling
